value: caption=Dashtadem fortress, Aragatsotn, close to Talin

- Just west of the town center is the huge 7th century cathedral built much in the style of the Cathedral of Ani a few kilometers west, and the Cathedral of Aruch, a few kilometers east down the highway, and worth a visit also.  Talin Cathedral also has a smaller, tiled-roof church near the entrance to the grounds.
,  6km south of Talin, has a castle and church in the middle of a fortress.  These are being restored, and are worth a side trip on the way to Gyumri in the north.
